page.title: 05Yarm Road
page.content: This part of Stockton is predominantly{commercial.} There are many private{offices}such as insurance, banking and accountancy. There are also a number of both private and public{hotels. } Several Working Men's Clubs (C.I.U.) and some private clubs are found in this area. A number of dentist's surgeries, opticians and chiropodists are in this vicinity, as well as several legal firms. There are some older Victorian houses, some of which have been turned into flats. Four Christian Churches can be found on Yarm Road. (More details on page 4).
